title: Camilla: I was prisoner in my own home after Prince Charles affair exposed

og.title: Camilla was 'prisoner in own home' after Charles affair exposed
og.description: The Duchess of Cornwall has spoken publicly for the first time about the anguish she suffered when her affair with Prince Charles was revealed.

twitter.description: The Duchess of Cornwall has spoken publicly for the first time about the anguish she suffered when her affair with Prince Charles was revealed.
twitter.title: Camilla was 'prisoner in own home' after Charles affair exposed
